name: Posting
summary: Mappings primarily intended to ease preparing of USENET/eMail articles
description: "Posting" provides a few mappings I once messed around with in order to ease preparing USENET/email articles with GVim. (Due to a malfunction at vim.org I had to register again. Earlier versions can be found at http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=487.)

versions.release_notes:
- Added paste command variants 'Footnoted' and 'Tabled'
- Top-posting: Footnotes appear at the proper place now
- <Cr> turns on Scan mode automatically
- Zoom in/out works for Lucida_Console too
- Improved format=flowed support
- Works for console Vim too now
- Various minor changes (also bugfixes)
